entries.@pve_tutorial_shooting_hint: Press and hold <font color='#209DD6'>%fire%</font> to shoot / <font color='#209DD6'>%zoom%</font> to aim
entries.@pve_tutorial_jumping_hint: Press <font color='#209DD6'>%jump%</font> to jump over obstacles
entries.@pve_tutorial_grenades_hint: Press <font color='#209DD6'>%toss_grenade_2%</font> to throw a grenade
entries.@pve_tutorial_ultimate_hint: Ultimate ability ready. Press <font color='#209DD6'>%select_item_slot_special_weapon%</font> to activate.
entries.@pve_tutorial_revive_hint: Press <font color='#209DD6'>%use%</font> to perform a revive action
entries.@pve_tutorial_smoke_hint: Use a smoke grenade to conceal yourself. Press <font color='#209DD6'>%toss_grenade_1%</font> to throw.
entries.@pve_tutorial_zipline_hint: Use a zipline to get down
entries.@pve_tutorial_cover_hint: <font color='#f4be34'>Take cover to restore your health</font>
entries.@pve_tutorial_reequip: Press <font color='#209DD6'>%toggle_esc_menu%</font> to choose a different weapon
